title: Media Channel
description: Standardized advertising media channels describing where ads reach audiences. See the Media Channel Taxonomy specification for detailed definitions.

enumDescriptions.ctv: Connected TV applications and streaming on television screens
enumDescriptions.mobile_app: Native applications on smartphones and tablets (excluding CTV and social)
enumDescriptions.social: Social media platforms (may be delivered via web or app)
enumDescriptions.search: Search engine results pages and search advertising networks
enumDescriptions.streaming_audio: Digital audio streaming services (Spotify, Pandora, etc.)
enumDescriptions.dooh: Digital out-of-home screens in public spaces
enumDescriptions.print: Newspapers, magazines, and other print publications
enumDescriptions.email: Email advertising and sponsored newsletter content
enumDescriptions.affiliate: Affiliate networks, comparison sites, and performance-based publisher partnerships
enumDescriptions.ai_agents: AI assistants, chatbots, and voice interfaces
enumDescriptions.sponsorship: Sponsorships, product placement, and branded content integrations
enumDescriptions.commerce_media: Retail media networks and transactional marketplaces (Amazon, Instacart, etc.)
